name: GUILT (kanatakkun)
description:
"Yesterday, I played with my big brother. Yesterday, I killed my big brother.  Ah, I forgot to bury his corpse."

The story revolts around a girl named Eli and his sickly big brother, Lit. It all began with the younger sibling's story. Then the truth may unfold at the end of the older sibling's point of view...

Though, in this dream-like reality where happiness no longer exist to them...
Will Eli, or rather, both of them found the reason behind all of these meaningless truth?

Features

  • Short duration
  • Pixelated graphics
  • No battle processing
  • Simple, (in total only 4 colors) graphics
  • Mysterious and dark story
  • No hard puzzles
  • Single Ending
  • Story oriented / visual novel
  • Custom sound effects & music
  • Cutscenes
  • Minor blood (pixel)
  • Murder
  • Small size (excluding RTP), and
  • A bizzare world.
